alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Madison; Oglethorpe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:49PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Clarke, northwestern Oglethorpe and south central Madison Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 549 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Dunlap, or 8 miles northwest of Lexington, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Winterville, Crawford, Colbert, Arnoldsville, Athens-Clarke County, Dunlap and Smithonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
